excerpt: "Founded in 2011 in Kenya, M-KOPA has expanded into Uganda, Nigeria and Ghana and is currently beginning operations in South Africa. By 2022, it had deployed more than $1 billion in credit with a focus on providing solutions that give people access to the digital world and help them financially in a way that is affordable and sustainable."
